title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-1.6 - Responsibility of employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-1.6 - Responsibility of employees

State Regulations

Every employee shall observe all the provisions of this

Part (rule) which directly concern or affect his conduct. He shall use the
safety devices provided for his personal protection and he shall not tamper
with or render ineffective any safety device, safeguard or personal protective
equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
